prop.name: TextColor
prop.p: This color defines the default text color for the control. A text box is expected to render text in this color when colorization is not in use.

The type of this property is (vl::)presentation::elements::text::ColorEntry with these components:
normal: color for text.
selectedFocused: color for selected text when this control is focused.
selectedUnfocused: color for selected text when this control is not focused.
These components are (vl::)presentation::elements::text::ColorItem, which has text and background for the color of the text and the color of the background behind the text.

prop.name: CaretColor
prop.p: This color defines the default caret color for the control.
